welcome_message_body: Welcome to Vista, a charming city known for its beautiful weather, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our diverse community and enjoy all that Vista has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mc Clellan-Palomar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mc Clellan-Palomar Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gillespie Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Gillespie Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
